prHeadline: Gateless Adds Rick Lang as Chief Operating Officer to Help Transform AI Mortgage Experience
headlineTxt: Aug 12, 2021, 15:05 ETGateless Adds Rick Lang as Chief Operating Officer to Help Transform AI Mortgage ExperienceFoundry, a business unit of Kodak Alaris. The solutions provided by Gateless incorporate the latest in AI with patent-pending machine learning and machine-vision technology that help automate the mortgage process, increase productivity and lower costs.More news about: Gateless
